name: StarGlider [prototype]
description:
Prototype space shooter, play til you die.

Shields will take the blow of 1 hit and will regenerate after a few seconds.

Enemies get stronger as time goes on, you will not survive.

After you die it will automatically restart.

Weapons:

Shrapnel launcher (Left) - Shoots a barrage of pellets.

Rapid fire ballistics (Down) - Full auto pellet launcher.

Energy Blaster (Right) - Press to fire once, Hold to charge blast.

Support:

Space Brakes (Right) - Hold to slow down considerably.

Repulsion Wave (Down) - Press to launch a wave that pushes back enemies.

Controls:

LMB - Shoot primary

RMB - Deploy tracking Bomb

E (Hold) - Choose support item (Click it)

Q (Hold) - Choose Weapon (Click it)

Space - Activate support item

M - Fullscreen
